name: The Moated Country Chateau
description:
DESCRIPTION
The Moated Country Château is a private estate of 7 hectares located one hour from Paris in the Oise, at the crossroads of the 3 departments forming Picardy. Your marriage is sacred, and for good reason: it should remain in your memories as the most beautiful day of your life.
The Château offers you everything you need to organize your reception. A country estate, with its quality accommodation, its terraces, its lush green garden and much, much more.
Your Wedding at The Castle:
The Château will delight you and your guests during a memorable reception: its privileged location in the Oise, at the crossroads of the three Picardy departments, is in a region rich in history.
The Château is located in the middle of a body of water planted with a French garden, an orchard and woods where mallards, geese, herons and deer live in freedom. The Château offers you a 130m2 banquet room for your reception, fully equipped with tables, chairs, lighting effects and incorporated sound systems, to bring the evening of your dreams to life. Ideal for 100 adults and 30 children in seated reception.
If you want to take advantage of the wooded park on your wedding day, the Château provides you with its green spaces for your reception or to take your photos. With an environment and an incomparable calm, everything on site invites to bucolic walks and incredible moments of sharing.
The wedding castle promises you a country wedding in a perfectly formed domain. This wedding castle will make you spend an unforgettable moment for a wedding.
Your reception in the most beautiful wedding halls in the Oise:
The wedding castle presents all the assets to make your union a truly special day. Located only a hundred kilometres from the capital, this wedding area will allow you to experience a beautiful setting, lush with greenery and escape in the Hauts-de-France.
For the bride and groom looking for a grandiose wedding, in a place oozing charm and romanticism, the wedding castle is the ideal destination. Look no further: you have found your exceptional place to celebrate your wedding, just 1 hour from Paris, meaning it is easily accessible by both air and road from the UK.
Discover our wedding room which will welcome you and your guests for the most beautiful day of your life. The white draped ceilings, the intimate and refined atmosphere, the park for your reception, will blow you away. The wedding castle is an enchanting mansion par excellence reminiscent of the fairy tales of your childhood, offers you an idyllic setting to celebrate your wedding. All you have to do is put the wedding ring on the finger of your loved one to be filled with happiness.
Organize your cocktails, lunches or photoshoots against the backdrop of the large courtyard. Equipped with powerful lighting for night time events.
At the children's disposal, you will find the 100 m² play area "the little castle", enclosed by metal guardrails. On the other side of the domain, the 4.50 x 9.00 m heated swimming pool, ping pong table, table football and more.
Additional details:
A 130 m² air-conditioned and fully equipped reception room
Video projector and mood lighting (sonosensitive led spotlight, mirror ball, laser, black light, etc.)
600 m² courtyard
Quality accommodation with 46 beds - 17 bedrooms
Parking for up to 65 vehicles
The catering service is possible but not imposed
Decoration possible from Friday afternoon
A professional kitchen equipped for caterers and a room for children
No time limit
Accommodation:
Each room in the castle is warmly decorated with stylish furniture. The walls lined with coloured fabrics, offer a refined atmosphere. In the outbuildings, the 2 very spacious gites offer modern comfort.
There are five beautiful bedrooms in the Chateau for up to 13 guests and then there are also 5 gites which can cater for a further 36 guests.
Pricing:
There are many different options for your wedding and stay at the Chateau, one option is the Weekend Package which includes a 2-day rental, from Saturday to Sunday for 100 seated people + 20 children and accommodation for 50 guests on site. Includes tables, chairs, crockery and decorations. Catering not included. From 4300 euros. + 1500 € per additional day
For further information please do get in touch and we will be more than happy to provide you with more detail. We look forward to welcoming you to our Chateau.
Photo Credit: Fred Photography & Gerem Photography
